long_description: Super simple in design, the polyester KAVU Singapore Satchel is super roomy with pockets inside and out to keep you organized. Polyester fabric is durable and easy to clean. Adjustable webbing shoulder strap fits cross-body or as a shoulder bag. Front exterior curved zipped pocket has a key clip inside. Rear zip pocket; inside rear zip pocket; inside drop-in pockets. KAVU Singapore Satchel is large enough to hold a lightweight jacket and a hat for your travels. Closeout.
short_description: Super simple in design, the polyester KAVU Singapore Satchel is super roomy with pockets inside and out to keep you organized.
